projects.name: Emporia E-commerce Platform
achievements: Built an e-commerce app with Flask and React featuring authentication, cart, and RESTful APIs for orders and inventory
Designed modular architecture using SOLID principles for scalability
Applied Factory and Command patterns for clean structure and reliability
Implemented input validation, JWT-based authentication, and access control
Handled 100+ simultaneous users in testing with smooth cart updates and no order failures

projects.name: AutoDoc
achievements: Built an AI-powered Python documentation generator using DeepSeek via Ollama
Implemented a FastAPI backend with async code parsing and seamless model integration
Developed an interactive viewer using React and TailwindCSS
Added PDF export to enable easy browsing and downloading of generated docs

projects.name: Static Site Generator
achievements: Built a custom static site generator in Python to convert Markdown to HTML
Added support for advanced formatting and templating features
Designed a modular architecture with over 90% test coverage

projects.name: Real-time Weather Analytics Platform
achievements: Architected a serverless AWS Lambda pipeline for weather data analysis across 10+ regions
Implemented IAM roles and access controls to secure AWS resources and manage permissions
Designed an interactive dashboard for climate zone monitoring and real-time alerts

projects.name: GPU Architecture Performance Analysis
achievements: Developed Python scripts to monitor GPU performance across NVIDIA architectures
Benchmarked CUDA kernels on RTX 3000/4000 series GPUs using Nsight Compute
Utilized Nsight Graphics to analyze API calls and shader execution in gaming engines

projects.name: Ocular Eye Disease Detection
achievements: Developed an ML model with TensorFlow to detect 8 ocular diseases from 5000+ retinal images
Achieved 86% accuracy using EfficientNetB0 and transfer learning
Improved feature extraction with K-means clustering and PCA

projects.name: Shadow-interiors Website
achievements: Designed and developed a website for an interior design company using React and Firebase
Crafted a clean, modern UI that increased brand presence
Deployed to Firebase Hosting, improving performance and scalability
